DOC.brief_summary: The purpose MOM Program promote child development help family become competent access use available resource . The program focus childhood immunization , Early Intervention service , lead screening , Early Head Start Head Start enrollment . The hypothsis child receive intervention participate public service primary healthcare activity show effective improving development .
DOC.brief_title: The MOM Program Children 's Hospital Philadelphia
DOC.detailed_description: The MOM Program 3 year randomize control trial mother newborn . At enrollment subject give questionnaire assess self efficacy non-verbal test intelligence . Program personnel blind result test . Test result use data analysis end study compare outcomes intervention control group assess mother impair cognitive ability benefit participation study.The Intervention consist frequent phone call home visit encourage mother baby immunize schedule participate need developmental educational service . At 33 month age child receive developmental assessment .
